title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 11.7 - Knowledge of proposed insider transaction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 11.7 - Knowledge of proposed insider transaction

State Regulations

Any insider, having knowledge of an insider transaction
between the bank and: (a) that
insider; (b) another
insider; (c) a person related to
that insider or such other insider; or
(d) any other person where the transaction
inures to the tangible economic benefit of that insider or such other insider, or a person related to that insider; which is subject to approval and disclosure under section
11.3
of this Part, shall give
timely notice of such transaction to the bank's board or directors or
trustees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
11.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
